li.label: Techno-Ghost
li.description: For some strange reason, {PAWN_nameDef} is not touched by ancient mechanoids, they constantly ignore [PAWN_objective] no matter what {PAWN_nameDef} takes against them.

GeneDef.label: mechaskin
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene have archites that completely transform their body.
The body is covered with plates, and the skin becomes hard and resembles plasteel to the touch. The glands are replaced by small colonies of mechanites that serve the body. Mechanites draw energy directly from the host's body, greatly reducing metabolism. The hairline completely disappears, remaining only on the head or face. Muscle tissues are strengthened and become more resilient.
Most of the internal organs remain intact, but there are enough external changes to indicate that the host is more like a mechanoid than a human.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_Mechanoidization_HiddenBase
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that are capable of self-replication. This significantly reduces complexity and reduces the need for archites capsules.

GeneDef.label: archite-forge
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that are capable of self-replication. This significantly reduces complexity and reduces the need for archites capsules.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_Mechanoidization_PowerSourceBase
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that create a power source for mechanites, due to which mechanites cease to influence the carrier's metabolism.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Compensates for the effect of mechaskin on metabolism.

HediffDef.label: tox generator
HediffDef.description: The tox generator provides the mechanites with energy, but leaves behind toxic waste.

GeneDef.label: operating system
GeneDef.description: Archites modified the owner's brain quite a lot, which opened up new possibilities.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_Mechanoidization_FirmwareBase
GeneDef.label: firmware
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a strong predisposition to certain skills and lifestyle, it is written in them both at the program level and at the genetic level.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Expectations are always "sky-high" and cannot be higher or lower.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_Mechanoidization_SoftwareBase
GeneDef.label: AI
GeneDef.description: The carriers of these archites have software that helps them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Ancient mechanoids do not attack a pawn, even if a pawn attacks them.
Increases the opinion of pawns with the same gene by 10.

GeneDef.label: silent program
GeneDef.description: Archits disable the voice functions of the mech, which saves some resources.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Decreases the pawn's opinion of everyone who does not have the same gene by 100.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_Mechanoidization_RomanceChanceBase
GeneDef.label: AI
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a tough program that helps them find the best partners.

GeneDef.label: mechlink
GeneDef.description: Carriers of the gene have archites that form a mechlink in the brain, which allows them to control the mechanoids.

GeneDef.label: fleet connected
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that amplify the mechlink's signal, allowing the bearer to establish a stable link with a nearby fleet of mechanoids and use their systems. This link opens up access to the almost endless possibilities of mechanoid control.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_MechaVoicesBase
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that change their voice to a cool mechanoid voice.

GeneDef.Name: WVC_MechanoidizationUpgrades
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites which enhance the owner's mechanoidization.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Changes blood filth into machine bits.

GeneDef.label: exoskeleton
GeneDef.description: Archites greatly enhance the carrier's skeletal structure.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carrying capacity on the map increased to 20%.

GeneDef.label: light frame
GeneDef.description: Archites lighten the body of the carrier by optimizing the amount of fat and muscle mass, without losing the efficiency of the body.

GeneDef.label: immunostabilizer
GeneDef.description: Archites in the carrier's blood significantly enhance immunity.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Completely stops the progression of diseases.

GeneDef.label: additional mechanite clusters
GeneDef.description: Archites create additional mechanite clusters, slightly increasing regeneration.

GeneDef.label: improved T-adaptation
GeneDef.description: Archites significantly enhance the temperature adaptability of the carrier.

GeneDef.label: perfect shape
GeneDef.description: Archites modify the shape of the carrier, making them almost perfect.
